1.1.name: wordpress/claptastic-clap-button
1.1.description:
The clap! button is a small button readers can click to tell you they liked what they saw. It's easy. There is no registering or typing in extra information. Just click it.

This is the less annoying way to get readers' feedback who would otherwise not have left a comment or let you know they stopped by and liked what you did. If your readers loved the content but didn't have anything to add in the comments, they can just clap it. Or maybe you don't have a comment section--this is a great way to get feedback without imposing on your readers.

What's more is you can go to the Claptastic website (http://claptastic.appspot.com/) and check out what everyone is clapping about right at that moment, as well as get the most clapped-about content in the past. This website is designed to simply highlight the best content and send readers your way.
